scripts.build:front: rmdir /s /q dist && cd ..\PB-frontend && npm run build && xcopy dist ..\PB-backend\dist\ /E /H /I /Y
scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../pb-frontend && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../pb-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
